reviews.author: Emely Koepp
reviews.content: Turns in a performance that is unperceiving and abnormal as the forgetful plucky girl.

reviews.author: Annetta Schmidt
reviews.content: Turns in a performance that is obscure but boorish as the dynamic oddball.

reviews.author: Chanelle Stokes
reviews.content: Comes across as debauched and shamelessly ordinary as the vivacious plucky girl.

reviews.author: Lorena Jacobs
reviews.content: Turns in a performance that is delusive but demonic as the wrathful snoop.

reviews.author: Ashleigh Hodkiewicz
reviews.content: Comes across as hateful if not fearless as the broad igor.

reviews.author: Ignacio Gleichner
reviews.content: Turns in a performance that is impervious if not ludicrous as the ossified toadie.

reviews.author: Gennaro Harber
reviews.content: Comes across as senseless and puny as the strange mr fixit.

reviews.author: Jett Nolan
reviews.content: Appears banal but picayune as the tight stalker with a crush.

reviews.author: Jace Heaney
reviews.content: Achieves the feat of being dastardly and shamelessly weary as the juvenile minnesota fats.

reviews.author: Bonnie Ernser
reviews.content: Is sterile and at the same time expensive as the puny pointy haired boss.

reviews.author: Ressie Kunze
reviews.content: Constructs a character who is antiquated while managing to stay jealous as the voracious stupid boss.

reviews.author: Dillan Fritsch
reviews.content: Seems disgraceful but mindless as the abusive psycho for hire.
